column5: I have a fly in trip booked with Mattice Lake outfitters in spring. Looking for some suggestions on jig colors and baits. Thanks in advance for any help. pmv
Standard colored Jig Head will treat you just fine... chartreuse, orange, pink and what not.
Try to get some stand up jig heads. Great for fishing right on the bottom for walleye. I use a twister 2-3 inch with a touch of worm or minnow.
We fished pringle not weese but our best luck was charturse and orange jig heads and 3 inch charturse gulp minnows
